entries.title: Dances With Wolves actor 'trained wives how to use guns if police tried to break up family'
entries.description: A Dances With Wolves actor allegedly trained his wives how to use guns and told them to "shoot it out" if officers tried to "break their family apart".

entries.title: 'Your pain is my pain': Pope urges young people to forge a new future as he meets victims of atrocities in Congo
entries.description: Pope Francis has urged young people in the Democratic Republic of Congo to forge a new future without the ethnic rivalry, corruption and distrust that have fuelled so many bloody conflicts in Africa.

entries.title: 'I'm expecting death any time': How South Africa's scheduled power cuts put lives on the line
entries.description: A tube runs from Jeanette Mahlangu's nose to an at-home oxygen concentrator positioned on the side of her couch.

entries.title: Israel president uses artificial intelligence to write part of major speech
entries.description: Israel's president, Isaac Herzog, shocked hi-tech professionals at a major cybersecurity convention in Tel Aviv on Wednesday when he revealed that the opening part of his speech was written by artificial intelligence software.

entries.title: India's richest man loses $100bn in less than a week
entries.description: India's richest man has seen his personal wealth shrink by billions in less than a week.

entries.title: China 'a bigger threat to the world than Vladimir Putin'
entries.description: Former US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo has told Sky News he believes China's President Xi is a bigger threat to the world than Vladimir Putin.

entries.title: 'Impossible to escape': El Salvador opens 40,000-inmate prison in 'war against gangs'
entries.description: El Salvador has opened one of the world's largest prisons, which will hold 40,000 inmates as arrests soar in a government crackdown on violent crime.

entries.title: Five Canadian Mounties charged over death of indigenous man in custody
entries.description: Five Canadian Mounties have been charged over the death of an indigenous man in custody.

entries.title: 'Nobody is born smart': Ex-commander of Russian mercenary group apologises for fighting in Ukraine
entries.description: A former commander of Russia's notorious mercenary Wagner Group who is seeking asylum in Norway has apologised for fighting in Ukraine.

entries.title: King Charles won't appear on new Australian banknote - here's why
entries.description: Australia is removing the British monarchy from its banknotes and will feature an indigenous design rather than an image of King Charles on its new $5 note.
